alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 1:53AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches across Union Pass, but only 2 to 4 inches over South Pass. West winds gusting between 40 and 60 mph especially over exposed areas. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times including over South Pass from a combination of some snow and very strong wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is likely to fall between late this evening and midday Saturday. Backcountry enthusiasts can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
